hackathon-description-text: The Wolfram Language lets you take big ideas and turn them into reality in the space of a one day hackathon. Join us in Barcelona and receive tips and advice from our mentors.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winning teams will receive: 1 Raspberry Pi, 1 year access to Wolfram Alpha Pro, and 1 year access to the Producer level of the Wolfram Development Platform.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We will pick the most impressive and surprising projects that can be achieved with Wolfram Technologies!
How usable is your hack in its current state? Strive to create a functioning project even if it doesn't have a ton of features!
Does your hack combine principles from across different fields? Live up to our theme and make a hack that explore the intersection of computer science with other fields!
Is your hack polished? Create a streamlined hack that looks as great as it functions!

hackathon-description-header: Join us in Barcelona and receive tips and advice from our mentors.
